title: Topic 001 Question 178
body: A company hosts its website in the us-east-1 Region. The company is preparing to deploy its website into the eu-central-1 Region. Website visitors who are located in Europe should access the website that is hosted in eu-central-1. All other visitors access the website that is hosted in us-east-1. The company uses Amazon Route 53 to manage the website’s DNS records.
Which routing policy should a SysOps administrator apply to the Route 53 record set to meet these requirements?
